ygData.subject: Re: research and skulls
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont think that would work, before you can do the research and spell you have to know the language, in which case you can not create the spell if you dont
ygData.messageBody:
I dont think that would work, before you can do the research and spell you
have to know the language, in which case you can not create the spell if you
dont know the lang. Just having the "formula" is not enough. I for one
would not want to see that posted on this list in any case, even if it was
possible.

Shadair
16th Wizard of the House of J'Axx
Karana


Speaking of research spells. How do you know what language a book is in?
And could we just trade spell formulas over the list without buying the
books?
